titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report and any amendments reported from conference in disagreement on the joint resolution (H.J.Res.324) increasing the statutory limit on the public debt.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-277.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 325 - 84 (Record Vote No: 329).

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.J. Res. 324 (public debt limit) and any amendments in disagreement.
